DOC.brief_title: Dental Support Second Stage Labor Among Multiparous Women
DOC.detailed_description: Several study demonstrate dental support device ( DSD ) may increase isometric strength different muscle group ( 1-7 ) . A preliminary pilot study 32 woman 2009 show DSD may shorten second stage labor among nulliparous woman ( 8 ) increase expulsive effort parturient . The study hypothesis DSD may decrease length second stage labor decrease need obstetrical intervention cesarean delivery operative vaginal delivery . The Laboraide™ DSD develop specifically use labor . It inert device locate jaw interfere speak , breathe oral activity labor . It single use device , transfer woman . We hypothesize use device shorten second stage labor decrease obstetrical intervention rate . We also investigate 's efficiency pain management .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Singleton gestation 2 . Multiparous woman 3 . Term gestation ( > 37+0/7 week ) 4 . Signed write consent participate study 5 . Maternal age 1845 year 6 . Normal vital sign 7 .
